text: Windows Server can refer to either an individual or following versions of Microsoft Windows: *Windows 3.x Server (Windows NT 3.x Server) *Windows 4.0 Server (Windows NT 4.0 Server) *Windows 2000 Server (codenamed "5.0 Server (NT 5.0 Server)") *Windows Server 2003 (Windows XP Server) *Windows Home Server 2007 (Windows Server 2007/Windows Vista Home Server) *Windows Server 2008 (Windows Vista Server) *Windows Server 2008 R2 (Windows 7 Server) *Windows Home Server 2011 (Windows Server 2011/Windows 7.x Server/Windows 7.x Home Server) *Windows Server 2012 (Windows 8.x Server/Windows Server 8.x) *Windows Server 2012 R2 (Windows 8.1 Server/Windows Server 8.1) *Windows Server 2016 (Windows 10 Server/Windows Server 10) *Windows Server 2019 (Windows 10 Server/Windows Server 10) * Windows Server 2022 (Windows 10 Server/Windows Server 10) * Windows Server 2025 (Windows 11 Server/Windows Server 11)
title: Windows Server
